analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/17/0xedc1a631d4c3d0f554da14a4bce630f6cbc30a68.sol:
	Contract NitroPlatformToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/17/0xedc1a631d4c3d0f554da14a4bce630f6cbc30a68.sol#214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/17/0xedc1a631d4c3d0f554da14a4bce630f6cbc30a68.sol#84) is not in mixedCase
